short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for Faxmail to help create temporary emails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Temporary disposable email address. Faxmail.co is an innovative online service that provides users with temporary and disposable email addresses, designed to enhance privacy and security in the digital realm. 

FaxMail offers a free temporary, safe, anonymous, and complimentary disposable email address service, ensuring your peace of mind.

It offers a swift and straightforward solution to avoid spam, safeguard against unwanted advertising mailings, and protect against potential hacking attempts. 

With Faxmail.co, users can keep their real email addresses clean and secure, while confidently navigating online interactions.
